thread.title: 10 states where you get the least home for your money

author: Lorie Konish
title: 10 states where you get the least home for your money
text:
10 states where you get the least home for your money Joe Raedle | Getty Images 1 Hour Ago
It might be hard to find a large home in these states if you're on a budget.
Personal finance website GOBankingRates used real estate website Zillow's home price index to determine just how far $300,000 can go when shopping for a home.
Here are the states where that amount of money will stretch the least. 10. New York
Median list price per square foot: $182.20
